name: test_e2e_with_logs[CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001` |
| **Name** | Semicolon command separator with ls |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; ls -la`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20ls%20-la`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_CMDI_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Command Injection via Semicolon |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001-1765110927524-13d1dp pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20ls%20-la client=127.0.0.1 |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~8000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:35:27.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001-1765110927524-13d1dp pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20ls%20-la client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:35:27.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001-1765110927524-13d1dp pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_SEMICOLON_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20ls%20-la client=127.0.0.1
```
